user_prompt: I'm a knight from the Western Middle Ages. He holds a double-edged sword with two hands, and is fighting many enemies around him. The enemy has various weapons such as one-handed sword, two-handed sword, axe, and withdrawal, and protects themselves with full-body armor and shields. There is constant fierce battle for life and death. The vibration of both hands to express "I am feeling threatened with life."
prompt_variant: Fighting for survival in the Western Middle Ages, a knight tightly holds his double-edged sword in both hands as he engages with numerous armored opponents, highlighting the danger of the battle.
